velinov.java.vrep

Interface VrepServer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    StandardVrepServer

    public interface VrepServer
    Describes a VREP-server running in the VREP environment, to which a VrepClient can connect to. Only one VrepClient can connect to a VrepServer at a given time.
    Since:
    19.04.2015
    Author:
    Vladimir Velinov

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getIpAddress() 
      int getPort() 
      boolean isFree() 
      void setIsFree(boolean _isFree)
      set if the server is free or busy.

    • Method Detail

      • isFree

        boolean isFree()
        Returns:
        true if the server is free to connect to and false if the server is already used by a VrepClient.

      • setIsFree

        void setIsFree(boolean _isFree)
        set if the server is free or busy.
        Parameters:
        _isFree -

      • getIpAddress

        java.lang.String getIpAddress()
        Returns:
        the ip address where the server is located.

      • getPort

        int getPort()
        Returns:
        the port number of the server.
